name: drHackDream
description:
Discover who Dr HackDream is and who made his “sleep” end.
You will be sent on a mission - as an avatar - to steal data in some cyber-brains, defended by strange forms of defense. A mysterious man makes you do this and seems to know you. HackDream's avatar can run, use his cyber-sword and... slow time before jumping! Dodge your enemies' bullets by crouching before a jump, hop between a platform and the other to dodge deadly enemy charges and powerful traps that could fall upon your head. Destroy the security of each cyber-brain and take back data to the lab!

Dr HackDream is an action-platformer game developed for the Video game Design and Programming course at the Politecnico di Milano.
